article.headline: Hampton 89, Radford 74
article.story: SALEM, Va. (AP) -- Devin Green scored 28 points and Bruce Brown had a double-double with 20 points and 11 rebounds as Hampton defeated Radford 89-74 on Wednesday night at the Salem Civic Center. Green also had three assists and four steals for the Pirates (3-4). Rashad West scored 14 points and Adrian Woodard had 13. Reggie McIntyre had 17 points for the Highlanders (4-3), Olumuyiwa Popoola and Whit Holcomb-Faye each contributed 11, and Chris Goodin added 10. Hampton went on a 10-2 run midway through the first half to take a seven-point lead on a 3-pointer by Green. The Highlanders came back and took the lead before the Pirates went on an 11-2 run and held a 47-39 lead at halftime.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
